info.description: A secure implementation of the OCI Distribution Specification.
info.title: Stori Registry

head.summary: Verify that the endpoint implements the Stori API Specification.

delete.description: This operation deletes all namespaces and repositories hosted on the registry. Use with caution as it is very destructive.
delete.summary: Delete all namespaces in the registry.

get.summary: Get all namespaces the client has access to.

delete.description: This operation deletes a namespace from the registry as well as all repositories it contains.

get.summary: Get info about a specific namespace.

put.description: This operation creates an new namespace for storing image repositories.

delete.summary: Delete all repositories in a namespace.

get.summary: Get info about a specific repository.

delete.summary: Delete a repository from a namespace.

get.summary: Get info about a specific repository.

head.summary: Check if a specific repository exists.

parameters.description: A place to store an image.
parameters.name: repository

get.summary: Get a list of all Blobs in a repository.

delete.summary: Delete a blob from a repository.

get.summary: Download a blob from a repository.

head.summary: Verify that a blob exists in a repository.

get.summary: Get all manifests in a repository.

get.description: This minimal endpoint is used to verify that the registry implements the OCI Distribution Specification.

get.description: List a set of available repositories in the local registry cluster. Does not provide any indication of what may be available upstream. Applications can only determine if a repository is available but not if it is not available.
